H0.text: 4 centimeters is the distance at which a magnet and a metal paper clip have the strongest magnetic attraction.

H1.text: 8 centimeters is the distance at which a magnet and a metal paper clip have the strongest magnetic attraction.

H2.text: 12 centimeters is the distance at which a magnet and a metal paper clip have the strongest magnetic attraction.

H3.text: 16 centimeters is the distance at which a magnet and a metal paper clip have the strongest magnetic attraction.

A4.text: The strength of a magnetic field always decreases with distance from the magnetic source
